title: AskReddit but for PESU
content: To the people who attended one year of college from home, whatâ€™s the best and whats the worst thing?? (Apart from the obvious i.e. offline ESAs)

comments.body:
Best thing
You can literally play games while minimising classes
Worst thing
Writing offline exams after that lmao

I mean i get the point of writing offline exams. But i feel the worst thing about this generation of college goers is the lack of making memories in college, like my brother tells me about all the fun he had in college and i cant get any of that cuz of covid and i doubt itll get better near the end. And it is even worse for the 1st years (soon to be second years)

Best : You get to do whatever you want anytime of the day, attendance is no longer an issue.

Worst : Expect a fuck ton of useless work within unreasonable deadlines.
Lmao i get it! But also bear in mind that since all submissions are online copying assignments has never been easier
Getting caught and penalised by plagiarism checkers has never been easier too
